bug.short_desc: Acetoneiso does not list the files of an iso file with some content.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: In a Gnome session, in menu Mount, the function Browse does not list the files of an iso file with some content.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 6.7-16.fc24 | x86_64
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Clicking the link Browse opens just an empty Kdialog window. 2. Select an iso file with some content.
Actual results: Clicking the link Browse opens just an empty Kdialog window.
Expected results: the iso's content to be displayed.
AcetoneISO-6.7-19.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2c6432f719
AcetoneISO-6.7-19.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-5819f8a7a2

AcetoneISO-6.7-19.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2c6432f719

AcetoneISO-6.7-19.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-5819f8a7a2
AcetoneISO-6.7-19.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
AcetoneISO-6.7-19.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
